title: Help Can't play with friends at all
body: Right this bug started after i went onto the hextech page and it instantly crashes, after i relaunch league and start to connect it just constantly says [](https://gyazo.com/1e8daaa3965fc01def2becc4085e78b0) and i've tried all the fixes about changing time and all that nothing works i've reinstalled i've restarted i've tried everything i can't play league with my friends. I haven't tried playing by myself yet.

replies.body:
The EUW server was experiencing issues with the chat and certain aspects of the PvP.net service, and yesterday there was a message about it up on the [Service Status page.](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/)

The issue should be resolved by now, but if you're still having issues, let me know.
